name: CARDIOLOGY
description: The field includes medical diagnosis and treatment of congenital heart defects, coronary artery disease, heart failure, valvular heart disease

name: UROLOGY
description: Urology is a part of health care that deals with diseases of the male and female urinary tract (kidneys, ureters, bladder and urethra)

name: NEUROSURGERY
description: Neurosurgery or neurological surgery, known in common parlance as brain surgery, is the medical specialty concerned with the prevention

name: VASCULAR SURGERY
description: Vascular surgery is a surgical subspecialty in which diseases of the vascular system, or arteries, veins and lymphatic circulation

name: ONCOLOGY
description: Oncology is the study of cancer. An oncologist is a doctor who treats cancer and provides medical care for a person

name: ICU
description: Intensive care units (ICUs) are specialist hospital wards that provide treatment and monitoring for people who are very ill.
